description:
Certain events leave a lasting impact on your professional, personal and financial lives. Disputes with your employer, medical mistakes and serious accidents can all cost you well-being, peace, and money. We at Headley Ballard LLC are here to help give you the chance to be made whole again and to get your life back on track.

Our law firm's attorneys recognize that what you need is to have someone on your side fighting for your rights and best interests. From our Pearisburg, Virginia office, we have helped many clients like you resolve legal issues in the following matters:

  • Medical malpractice claims, such as surgical errors, misdiagnoses, medication mistakes, and more
  • All types of personal injury and wrongful death claims, including motor vehicle accidents and premises and product liability claims
  • Employee claims, such as sexual harassment, discrimination, wrongful termination, and more

Allowing our law firm to advocate on your behalf will alleviate the frustration and stress you may be feeling regarding your current circumstances. We believe that resolving your legal issues could give you the peace of mind you need during this challenging time in your life. While our team helps you pursue the maximum amount of compensation and damages to which you are entitled, you will have much more freedom to focus on your emotional and physical recovery.

When you need aggressive and experienced legal advocacy for one or more of the above legal matters, contact Headley Ballard LLC through our law firm's website or via phone. We also offer virtual consultations designed to keep you and your family safe in these uncertain times.
